content:
Yes, here are some affordable restaurants in Montreal:

1. Schwartz's Deli - This legendary deli is famous for its smoked meat sandwiches at a reasonable price. 2. St-Viateur Bagel - A Montreal classic, this bagel joint offers freshly baked bagels with a variety of toppings at a reasonable price. 3. La Banquise - This 24-hour diner is known for its poutine, a Quebecois dish made with french fries, cheese curds, and gravy. 4. Olive & Gourmando - This bakery café offers sandwiches, salads, and pastries at affordable prices. 5. Marché des Éclusiers - This farmer's market-style eatery offers fresh, locally-sourced produce and a variety of homemade dishes at reasonable prices. 6. Pizzeria Gema - This pizzeria offers delicious Neapolitan-style pizza for an affordable price. 7. Patati Patata - This casual diner serves up classic fast food favorites, like burgers and fries, at a reasonable price. These are just a few suggestions; Montreal has many affordable dining options to choose from.
